positions.subtitle: Unilever
positions.description: 1. Designed and implemented advanced Generative AI(GPT) Chatbot application using Langchain, RAG & Vector Databases, including an interactive simulation zone for data-driven decision-making, enhancing data presentation, productivity and accessibility for business leaders and significantly streamlining the decision-making process.2. Delivered a tool to realize 50Mn+ Euros savings for the business, focused on innovative Waste Reduction using ETL processes, leveraging Azure Data Factory and Azure Databricks. 3. Worked as a Data Engineer on a tool that delivered complex insights in a summarized format using PySpark and PySQL, significantly reducing manual hours and enhancing business efficiency through actionable insights.. 4. Automated data quality checks that decreased error rates in datasets by 50%, significantly improving the reliability of reporting and analytics processes.5. Developed a Threshold Identifier project aimed at quantifying the chain in growth across various business metrics, conducted a comparative analysis of supervised learning, unsupervised learning (Clustering), and statistical techniques to identify the most effective approach. 6. Proficiently addressed business challenges through comprehensive utilization of core Data Science expertise and hands-on programming involvement.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------1. Selected as one of the top 5 individuals from India and top 24 globally to represent Unilever at the One Young World Summit.2. Top performer with highest performance points in the team for consecutive years.3. CDO awards for Passion for Purpose, Service & Sustainibility, Agility & Passion For High Performance.4. Won Inspiring fresher award in my First Year at Unilever.
positions.title: Intelligent Automation Specialist
positions.description_html:
1. Designed and implemented advanced Generative AI(GPT) Chatbot application using Langchain, RAG & Vector Databases, including an interactive simulation zone for data-driven decision-making, enhancing data presentation, productivity and accessibility for business leaders and significantly streamlining the decision-making process.
2. Delivered a tool to realize 50Mn+ Euros savings for the business, focused on innovative Waste Reduction using ETL processes, leveraging Azure Data Factory and Azure Databricks.
3. Worked as a Data Engineer on a tool that delivered complex insights in a summarized format using PySpark and PySQL, significantly reducing manual hours and enhancing business efficiency through actionable insights..
4. Automated data quality checks that decreased error rates in datasets by 50%, significantly improving the reliability of reporting and analytics processes.
5. Developed a Threshold Identifier project aimed at quantifying the chain in growth across various business metrics, conducted a comparative analysis of supervised learning, unsupervised learning (Clustering), and statistical techniques to identify the most effective approach.
6. Proficiently addressed business challenges through comprehensive utilization of core Data Science expertise and hands-on programming involvement.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Selected as one of the top 5 individuals from India and top 24 globally to represent Unilever at the One Young World Summit.
2. Top performer with highest performance points in the team for consecutive years.
3. CDO awards for Passion for Purpose, Service & Sustainibility, Agility & Passion For High Performance.
4. Won Inspiring fresher award in my First Year at Unilever.
